DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine rout excretion JNJ-53718678 metabolite , explore metabolic pathway JNJ-53718678 , determine chemical structure predominant metabolites healthy adult male participant single oral dose 500 milligram ( mg ) 14C-JNJ-53718678 .
